show.subtitle: Stories and news that affect us all
show.title: Leid Stories

title: Leid Stories
content:
Of Course You’re Different! You Actually Use Your Brain! <!--more--> It’s Tuesday, Open Forum day on Leid Stories, where great minds gather for vigorous, substantive discussion and debate about issues of the day.
No “wrong” or “right” judgments here about what you have to say, but respect and appreciation for sharing your thoughts and opinions and extending the same courtesies to others.
There is a lot to talk about and share since last week’s Open Forum.
What’s been percolating in your brain?
